# apstra_ip4_pool (Resource)

This resource creates an IPv4 resource pool

## Example Usage

```terraform
# todo
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Pool name displayed in the Apstra web UI

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Apstra ID number of the resource pool
